title: Last Knight at Camelot (DOS) - Retail
description:
LAST KNIGHT AT CAMELOT - 1.0 RETAIL
--------------------------------------------

*** UPDATE 8. OCTOBER 2008***
This is no longer being seeded by me, nor, does it appear, by anyone else.
I've uploaded it here: http://solidfiles.com/d/7bfbd51b81ae70eb494bd70bfe37b7e3


I bought this game back in the 90s by faxing an order form and receiving floppies by mail...can you believe we used to do it that way?

Anyway, this is a fun old platformer that works seamlessly in the latest build of DosBOX (and, to my knowledge, VDMSound).

I don't know if anyone wants this, but here you go. I'll seed for a month or so.

Sparky
